level.heading: Remedy.
level.text: The Rental Housing Commission, Rent Administrator, or any affected housing provider or tenant may commence a civil action in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to enforce any rule or decision issued under this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-10
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-10, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 42-3501.01.

level.heading: Termination of law Termination of Law 6-10
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 42-3502.01.
